text: The stock market saw a significant rise today due to positive economic indicators.
Apple Inc. announced a new line of MacBooks with M3 chips, boosting its stock price.
Federal Reserve Chair hints at possible interest rate cuts in the next quarter.
Tesla's new electric vehicle model outperforms previous versions in battery efficiency.
Microsoft partners with OpenAI to integrate GPT-4 into its cloud services.
Gold prices surge as investors seek safe-haven assets amid geopolitical tensions.
